sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using DuckBuck, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

sections.title: 2. Use of Service
content: You must be at least 13 years old to use DuckBuck
You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account
You agree not to use the service for any illegal purposes
You will not attempt to breach or circumvent any security measures

sections.title: 3. User Content
content: You retain rights to content you create and share
You grant DuckBuck license to use, store, and display your content
You agree not to share inappropriate or harmful content

sections.title: 4. Service Modifications
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the service at any time.
